p: Currently, there is no specific and effective antiviral therapy available for COVID-19. However, most individuals with COVID-19 have a mild/asymptomatic or moderate course of the disease; in up to 5%â€“10% of individuals the course of the disease is severe and can lead to death in vulnerable sections of the community. The immediate need for effective drugs is crucial at this stage ( www.covidreference.com) [ 34].
